subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, the world No. 3, and the U.S. Open champion, Juan Martín del Potro, kicked off their preparations with easy first-round victories at the Kooyong Classic in Melbourne.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, the world No. 3, and the U.S. Open champion, Juan Martín del Potro, kicked off their preparations with easy first-round victories at the Kooyong Classic in Melbourne.
